what_is_tablet_promotion.title: What is Tablet advertising
what_is_tablet_promotion.slogan: Let's work together and change ourselves and our community
what_is_tablet_promotion.description: Tablet advertising is a company that advertises the production of various organizations product through taxi and buses using tablet computers. In this role it is generating more revenue for many taxi and bus drivers as well as vehicle investors. Tablet advertising is an organization registered under the Ethiopian Employment Agency Proclamation No. 0987/2017.
what_is_tablet_promotion.description_3: It is a family company with the aim of transforming the lives of many Ethiopians. Join us and change together

slider.advertiser: Start adverting your product and increase your revenue.
slider.advertiser_description: Do your work, Leave advertising your product to us
slider.driver: Are you a taxi or bus driver, then earn extra income by becoming a member of Tablet Advertising
slider.driver_description: Make an advert on your car and earn more money
